alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Holmes; North Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 11:28AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Walton, Holmes and northwestern Washington Counties through 1115 AM CDT... At 1027 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles west of Bonifay, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... De Funiak Springs, Bonifay, Chipley, Eglin Air Force Base, Union, Liberty, Ponce De Leon, Caryville, Esto, Westville, Noma, Oakwood Hills, Cluster Springs, Whitehead Crossroads, Cerrogordo, Gritney, Glendale, Pleasant Ridge, Izagora and New Harmony. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 PM CDT for the Panhandle of Florida.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Holmes; North Walton; Washington
